Creates a socket address where the IP address is the wildcard address * and the port number a specified value.
Returns the byte array that backs this * buffer  (optional operation). *
Body Length: Full Length - Head Length
Head Length: include head data from magic code to head map.
Array Index Out Of Bounds Exception
OkSocket, duplex read error,thread is dead with exception:java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: length=4; index=4
This method transfers the entire content of the given source * byte array into this buffer. An invocation of this method of the * form dst.put(a) behaves in exactly the same way as the * invocation
According to the packet header data in the transport protocol, the package length is 16777216 Bytes.

Relative bulk put method  (optional operation). * *

This method transfers the entire content of the given source * byte array into this buffer. An invocation of this method of the * form dst.put(a) behaves in exactly the same way as the * invocation

Relative put method  (optional operation). * *

Writes the given byte into this buffer at the current * position, and then increments the position.

*

*

Writes four bytes containing the given int value, in the * current byte order, into this buffer at the current position, and then * increments the position by four.

*
full Length(4B) and head length(2B) will fix in the end.
maxFrameLength (" + maxFrameLength + ") must be equal to or greater than lengthFieldOffset
lengthFieldOffset must be a non-negative integer
maxFrameLength must be a positive integer:
